room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: I've done over a dozen escape rooms and can honestly say that the team at Escape Room Palm Springs is the best!! The rooms are well thought out and just soo much fun. I am such a fan that we've come back 3 years in a row. This is a must ... must.. must do if you are in Palm Springs. My favorite room is Vampire's Lair. Also all the employees here are top notch and truly care. I love this place.

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: So much fun. Everyone is so nice. The vampire room was fun and perfect for us to try with my 11 year old son. I will definitely come back and try their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: We had the absolute pleasure of going through the Vampire escape room as a large group and Brandi was an awesome game master. It was such a well thought out escape room and super fun. I would recommend to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Did two rooms today, the Titanic Room and the Vampire Room. Just the right balance of difficulty and fun...cleaver without being ridiculous...with a staff that was really top notch. Thanks to Emily and Evee for all your insight and guidance. Good time for all.

room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Had a blast. Went with our adult children and did Vampire's Lair. We are first timers except for my 22 yr old son, who has been to several places. He said it was one of thy he best ones he has been to. Kay and all the staff very friendly and helpful. We will definitely be back to check out the other rooms. This is a must do!
